name: Sheep Go Boom
description:
A top down shooter made for the Wowie Game Jam. 

The aim is to protect your flock of comically explosive sheep from incoming poachers, using your whistle to guide them and your trusty weapons to fend off enemies. As a last resort, you can throw a sheep to cause it to explode, a sacrifice for the good of your flock.

Hold out each wave for the reinforcements to scare off the poachers.
